subject: Re: FW: Order for Unitron Moxi V1 and Moxi V1 R
preview: Hi Rica,  Hope you had a nice weekend!  Great, thanks so much!  Christine

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Hope you had a nice weekend!

Great, thanks so much!

Christine

Hi Christine, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://unitronmarketing.com.au/moxi-v/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Hi team,

Please use the 2 versions attached instead.

Thank you,

Christine

Hi Christine,

This is noted. We will make the changes on the designated date and time.

Thanks Rica,

If the updates can please be live by 8.30 am AEST, Monday 6 May 2024.

Thank you,

Christine

Hi Christine,

Sure, will do that as well.
Thanks Rica, can you please ensure to remove the old version for both files under that section?
Added to to do list on May 6 2024

Hi Christine,

Sure, we will upload the new Feature Summary and the Product Selection guide of  Moxi V and Stride V on the launch date 6 May 2024.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi team,

Can you please update the Feature Summary and the Product Selection guide under Moxi V and Stride V with the attached new versions to go live on launch date 6 May 2024.

@Newby, Eric, can you please ensure this new version is printed as required for 3PL stock and the old versions to be disposed of after the launch date?

Thank you,
Christine

Sent: Thursday, March 28, 2024 5:16 PM
To: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Order for Unitron Moxi V1 and Moxi V1 R


All good Irene, I can see the files now.

If this launch will be like Blu 1, we didn't need any launch kits, only digital files were provided in the eDM. Hopefully, that will be the same for this launch.

That's right - for the SDS 5.0 eDM, I wasn't too sure what to include, especially the paragraph about "These products will therefore be discontinued and removed from the HSP list. We will continue to support these products in the future for spare parts and warranty." - I just got this from a previous phase-out eDM.


No worries, will look at your edits early next week.


Thank you, you too, enjoy the Easter break!
Christine

From: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Sent: Thursday, March 28, 2024 5:08 PM

I'll add more info as we go.

I've just had too much on this week.


Take care and enjoy the break.

Speaking of SDS 5.0, let me know if you had updates to the eDM when you get a chance.

Thank you, have a blessed and Happy Easter! 😊
Christine

Subject: RE: Order for Unitron Moxi V1 and Moxi V1 R


Hi Anthony

Are you saying Moxi B1 RIC or Moxi B1 312? Pls elaborate

With the launch of this product, I would expect close to 100% cannibalisation of the Moxi B1 RIC - we can start to reduce stock levels of this product once we have a confirmed launch date of the V1.

Regards



Jack Hsu
Supply Chain Manager

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd

12 Inglewood Place, 2153 Nowest, AU
Email: jack.hsu@sonova.com
Website: www.sonova.com


From: Cordi, Anthony <Anthony.Cordi@phonak.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 27, 2024 10:41 PM
To: Hsu, Jack <Jack.Hsu@sonova.com>
Cc: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>; Denda, Mick <Mick.Denda@sonova.com>; Thompson, Aaron <Aaron.Thompson@sonova.com>; Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Subject: Order for Unitron Moxi V1 and Moxi V1 R


Hi Jack,

We are now ready to place the order from the Moxi V1 and the Moxi V1 R. As the Moxi V1 will be offered as an alternative for Free to Client under the HSP scheme, we anticipate that this will be a big selling product. I am forecasting approx. 360 units per month of this product. The V1 R Is also likely to be a strong selling product and I am forecasting 206 units per month (and 103 additional chargers).

The colour split is below:

Material
 Material Description
 Units per month
050-6510-P2
 Moxi V1-R
 16
050-6510-P6
 Moxi V1-R
 82
050-6510-P7
 Moxi V1-R
 30
050-6510-R8
 Moxi V1-R
 78
050-6820-P2
 Moxi V1-312
 34
050-6820-P6
 Moxi V1-312
 140
050-6820-P7
 Moxi V1-312
 60
050-6820-R8
 Moxi V1-312
 134


With the launch of this product, I would expect close to 100% cannibalisation of the Moxi B1 RIC - we can start to reduce stock levels of this product once we have a confirmed launch date of the V1.

I have informed Unitron global of my intention to launch and we anticipate a mid to late April launch date, that we will confirm once we know when the stock is due to arrive.

Can you please go ahead and place the order for the above stock.

Given the large order I have cc'd Aaron in on this email.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks

Regards,

Anthony Cordi
Commercial Director - Phonak Australia
